ticket_will_be_on_sale_card.title: Tickets are not on sale yet
ticket_will_be_on_sale_card.description:
Ticket sales will start on October 7 (Monday). Please wait a moment.

Latest information will also be announced on the FlutterKaigi official X account (@FlutterKaigi).
ticket_will_be_on_sale_card.button: Go to the FlutterKaigi official X account

tickets.loginBeforeBuy: Please login with your Google account to buy or register a ticket.
tickets.ticketManagedByGoogleAccount: After purchase or registration, tickets will be managed by your Google account.

already_purchased_card.title: Thank you for purchasing a ticket!
already_purchased_card.description: You already have a ticket. Please check your ticket and edit your name card from the ticket page.
already_purchased_card.verify_error: An error occurred while verifying whether you have a ticket.

invitation.description: If you have an invitation code or coupon code, please enter it here.

validation.next_payment: By pressing OK, you will be redirected to Stripe. Please confirm that the promotion code is applied and purchase the ticket.
validation.next_confirm_order: By pressing OK, you will be redirected to Stripe. Please confirm that the promotion code is applied and confirm the order.

invited.title: Invitation code has been successfully validated
invited.warning: Pressing "Next" will finalize the information. If you need to make changes, please contact the organizers.

personal_sponsor.name: Personal Sponsor Ticket
description: - Personal Sponsor Ticket includes a general ticket

- **Pre-Party Access**: Access to the pre-party on November 20 (Wednesday) ([details here](https://medium.com/flutterkaigi/flutterkaigi-2024%E5%89%8D%E5%A4%9C%E7%A5%AD%E3%82%92%E9%96%8B%E5%82%AC%E3%81%97%E3%81%BE%E3%81%99-5e7ff7ba3947))
- **Exclusive Viewing Area**: Dedicated area in front of the session room

student.name: Student Discount
student.description:
If you are a student (Junior High School, High School, University(Including Junior College, Graduate School), Technical College, College of Technology(KOSEN), Specialized School, Vocational School)on the day of FlutterKaigi 2024, we will refund the full ticket price by showing your student ID at time of reception.
※ Refunds are only valid on the day of the event. Only general tickets are eligible. If you are unsure whether your educational institution is eligible, please contact the organizers.

verify_purchase.processing_description: Linking your purchase record and user. Please wait a moment...
verify_purchase.error: An error occurred while verifying the purchase of the ticket.
verify_purchase.error_description: The purchase could not be completed due to an error. Please refresh the page and try again.
verify_purchase.contact: If the problem persists, please contact the organizers.

log_out_dialog.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
log_out_dialog.description: Logging out will prevent you from purchasing or registering tickets until you log in again.

googleCopyright.text0: Flutter and the related logo are trademarks of Google LLC. FlutterKaigi is not affiliated with or otherwise sponsored by Google LLC.
googleCopyright.text1: The Flutter name and the Flutter logo

thankYouCard.title: Thank you for purchasing a ticket!

warning_for_speaker_profile.title: Note on Speaker Profile
warning_for_speaker_profile.description: Speaker profiles will be published on the FlutterKaigi official site. Please be careful.

warning_for_personal_sponsor.title: Note on Personal Sponsor Profile
warning_for_personal_sponsor.description:
You have a personal sponsor ticket. You can choose to publish your profile on the FlutterKaigi official site.
The profile will be published in mid-October.

information_for_profile_edit.title: Note on Profile Information
information_for_profile_edit.description:
The profile information you enter here will be printed on your name card at FlutterKaigi.
You can edit your name, comment, X account, and profile image.

profile_edit_restriction.title: Note on Profile Editing
profile_edit_restriction.description:
- Profile images can only be used with your Google account image or uploaded image.
- You can edit your profile until **Nov 12 (Tue) 22:00 JST**. After that, you will **not be able to edit your profile** due to printing reasons.

ticketPage.design_may_be_changed: ※The design of the name card may be changed on the day of FlutterKaigi 2024.

name.title: Name
name.description: Please enter your name. (20 characters or less, no special characters allowed)

validation.too_long: Name must be 20 characters or less

comment.title: Comment
comment.description: Please enter your comment. (40 characters or less, no special characters allowed)

validation.too_long: Comment must be 40 characters or less

x_account.title: X Account
x_account.description: Please enter your X account. (No @ symbol allowed)

validation.too_long: X Account must be 40 characters or less

avatar.title: Profile Image
avatar.description: Please upload your profile image. (PNG, JPG format)
avatar.delete_success: Profile image reset to default successfully
avatar.delete_error: Profile image reset to default failed

is_adult.title: Are you 20 or older on November 21, 2024?
is_adult.description: Alcohol will be served at the party for 20 or older attendees.

qrCode.title: Ticket QR Code
qrCode.description:
This QR code will be used at the reception on the day of FlutterKaigi 2024.
Please show this QR code to the staff on the day of the event.
qrCode.walletQrDescription: Scan this QR code with your iPhone to add the ticket to Apple Wallet

entrance_information.title: Entrance Information
description: A QR code for entry will be displayed on this page before FlutterKaigi 2024.
Please show the QR code to staff at the entrance.
